overview: Girlfriends Films brings you yet another scintillating and extremely steamy addition to the Lesbian Psychodrama affair! Volume 8 sports the sexual sensuality of Sheridan Love, Lexi Bloom, India Summer, Francesca Le, Darla Crane, Kara Price, Alison Tyler, and London Keyes in a tale of deceit, and that of transformation. A young woman who is inched slowly into a niche that she was not commonly familiar with, into a life that she grows to love - for a price!
title: Lesbian PsychoDramas 8
